document_data.mainbody:
Acid-etched hand crossbows were enchanted crossbows popularized in the 15 century DR.
These magic hand crossbows coated all bolts shot out of it with corrosive acid. Additionally, these weapons possessed +2 or +3 enchantments to the the damage and magics that guided the missiles towards their targets.
In the 15 century DR, acid-etched hand crossbows were in use in the city of Neverwinter, sold at the Mercenary Arms Depot, and found among savage inhabitants of the Old Owl Well during its occupation by orcish bandit bands.
